text:
HPI:
   50F w/ b/l LE weakness & SOB (desats to 45%) -> T7-9 vert body/epidural
   abscess s/p T2-L1 posterior fusion, T7-9 osteotomies, T2-L1
   instrumentation and IVC filter [**5-10**], c/b C.diff, s/p L thoracotomy,
   T6-8 partial vertebrectomies, T6-9 fusion [**5-20**], c/b epidural hematoma
   s/p I&D, wound debridement [**5-22**], s/p trach [**6-5**].
   Chief complaint:
   b/l LE weakness
   PMHx:
   PMH: HTN, DM2, neuropathy, COPD (recent intubation), IgG & IgA
   deficiency, colon ca, MRSA osteomyelitis (MTP joint), PE, anemia, CHF,
   hyperlipid, C.diff colitis
   PSH: colectomy/colostomy, toe amp ([**1-19**]), TAH
   [**Last Name (un) **]: albuterol, Atrovent, cardizem 60"", Prilosec 20', RISS, prednisone
   25' (since [**5-2**]), vit C 500", gabapentin 300", Requip 0.25''', MVI,
   OxyContin 40", Colace, Maalox, Dulcolax, Percocet
   Anxiety
   Assessment:
   Action:
   Response:
   Plan:
   Pain control (acute pain, chronic pain)
   Assessment:
   Action:
   Response:
   Plan:
   .H/O chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD, Bronchitis,
   Emphysema) with Acute Exacerbation
   Assessment:
   Action:
   Response:
   Plan:

info.concept: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease of horses
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease of horses
